about.summary: An async/await-native I/O library for humans and snake people

name: trio
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "trio" %}
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash_value = "0496f575ed118eb382346a728971766d54b3a3e39e9825e94d4d513b0fe96145" %}

package:
  name: '{{ name|lower }}'
  version: '{{ version }}'

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  '{{ hash_type }}': '{{ hash_value }}'

build:
  skip: True  # [py27]
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - attrs
    - sortedcontainers
    - async_generator >=1.9
    - contextvars
    - idna
    - cffi  # [win]

test:
  imports:
    - trio
    - trio._core
    - trio._core.tests
    - trio._core.tests.test_multierror_scripts
    - trio.testing
    - trio.tests

about:
  home: https://github.com/python-trio/trio
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An async/await-native I/O library for humans and snake people
  doc_url: https://trio.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/python-trio/trio

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nicoddemus

about.summary: An async/await-native I/O library for humans and snake people
